attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2010-1167

Date: 2010-09-24

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Glenda Yeates, former Associate Deputy Minister, Department of Health, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($209,800 - $245,900), for the period commencing April 1, 2010 and terminating April 18, 2010.
